H0.text: Apart from white, what colour are the other two ‘triangles’ on the BMW logo. Red

H1.text: Apart from white, what colour are the other two ‘triangles’ on the BMW logo. Silver

H2.text: Apart from white, what colour are the other two ‘triangles’ on the BMW logo. Black

H3.text: Apart from white, what colour are the other two ‘triangles’ on the BMW logo. Blue

A4.text: The BMW logo is quartered blue and white.
